CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(NokiaCPQ_Contract_Price_List__c )>0,IF(Nokia_CPQ_Env_Type__c='sCRM', HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=ContractPriceCatalogueExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Contract Price Export'), HYPERLINK( Nokia_Env_URL__c & '/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=ContractPriceCatalogueExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Contract Price Export')),null)
CustomField.label: Contract Product Price Catalogue
